headline: Parachutes for planes and hands-free umbrellas: it's the International Exhibition of Invention  in pictures
text: Chinese inventor Yu Gao with the emergency landing system of multi-layer parachutes for planes Photograph: Martial Trezzini/EPA       A Football Box, an invention for children which allows them to play in a miniature-sized football arena and was invented by Venezuelan Jose Pires Tavares  Photograph: Fabrice Coffrini/AFP/Getty Images       Marco Pagnini with a suspender for carrying an umbrella without using hands  Photograph: Fabrice Coffrini/AFP/Getty Images       Hsia Jung-Wen from Taiwan presents his invention, a baby bottle equipped with a drawing which changes its colour according to the temperature of the milk Photograph: Fabrice Coffrini/AFP/Getty Images       A South Korean invention to tie shoes with a single touch, shaped with a hook and a stop loop to control the tightness Photograph: Fabrice Coffrini/AFP/Getty Images       A robot seated on a small vehicle and made by the School of Business and Engineering Vaud Photograph: Fabrice Coffrini/AFP/Getty Images       Andre Piatetsky form the US presents his invention, a treatment hairbrush fitted with a liquid-reservoir that disperses treatment solution over the user's scalp Photograph: Fabrice Coffrini/AFP/Getty Images       Peng-Jen Chen of Taipei presents his invention, an electric folding bicycle  Photograph: Martial Trezzini/EPA       Yong-Fu Chang from Taiwan two teddy bears connected by Wi-Fi via the Internet equipped with microphones and speakers Photograph: Fabrice Coffrini/AFP/Getty Images       Turkish inventor Fatma Gulru of Turkey  with  a screw nail correcting apparatus, which is a patient friendly, self applicable nail brace totally made ofapproved dental material, to avoid operations and all complications with ingrown nails  Photograph: Martial Trezzini/EPA       Inventor Lee Beom Seok  with a multifunctional portable tool for clothing against bacteria and odour can also work as air purifier  Photograph: Fabrice Coffrini/AFP/Getty Images       Manuel Foix Robert and Victoria Gomez Gamez with their invention, a protective case made with tissue that can be used for food and plants  Photograph: Fabrice Coffrini/AFP/Getty Images       Yung-Chi Lin of Taipei presents his invention, protective equipment for high pollutant or highly toxic jobs  Photograph: Martial Trezzini/EPA       Ulli Boehme with his invention, the Ball Rider, a new sport and leisure vehicle equipped with large balls as wheels Photograph: Fabrice Coffrini/AFP/Getty Images
